CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Luxury Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Streetwear}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Fast Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Athleisure to Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Streetwear to High Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Athleisure and Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Athleisure and Luxury Fashion is {125}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Streetwear and Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Streetwear and Luxury Fashion is {120}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Fast Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow output from Fast Fashion is {409}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by High Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow input by High Fashion is {639}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 417? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {459} from {Streetwear} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {425} from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 93? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {67} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 213 and 267? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {221} from {High Fashion} to {Streetwear}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Streetwear to Fast Fashion or from Athleisure to High Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Fast Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Streetwear to High Fashion, from Luxury Fashion to Streetwear, or from High Fashion to Streetwear?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Luxury Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Fast Fashion} and {Streetwear}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Luxury Fashion, Arc Streetwear, Arc Fast Fashion, Arc High Fashion, Arc Athleisure}.
